block.trienowtweaks.compact_crafter.tool: §2Put an inventory on the left and right of this block.
§eItems in the left inventory will be crafted in a 2x2
§eor 3x3 pattern. §cThe right inventory is the output.
§aWill prohibit any Monsters from Spawning in a Chunk
§2Must be placed at the Chunk's origen at y = 255
block.trienowtweaks.item_detector.toolti: §e1 item entity = 1-64 items of the same type
block.trienowtweaks.streetlamp_flesh.too: Solange es keine §dFleischlampe§r ist §o-Jemand im TS 2016
item.trienowtweaks.we_wand.tooltip0: Hold it and press F3 + A, to see invisible blocks
item.trienowtweaks.auto_light.tooltip0: §cPlaces an invisible light source, when it is dark.
cmd.trienowtweaks.treq.help:
§a=== §cTeleport Requester Subcommands §a===
§cto <Player>§r
 Send a teleport-request §oto§r a specific player
§caccept <Player§ls§r§c>§r
 Accepts a request §ofrom§r another player
§cblock <Player§ls§r§c>§r
 Blocks all teleport-requests §ofrom§r given players
§cunblock <Player§ls§r§c>§r
 Allows given players to send requests again
§a[NOTE]:§r The §b@§r-Selectors work on §c<Player§ls§r§c>§r arguments
cmd.trienowtweaks.treq.to.fail.dimension: §c[TREQ]§r §b%1$s §cis in a different §edimension §cthan you. This requires special code, which §atrienow §chasn't dealt with yet.
cmd.trienowtweaks.treq.to.fail.duplicate: §c[TREQ]§r §cYou are already sent a request to §b%1$s§c.
cmd.trienowtweaks.treq.to.requesting:
§a[TREQ] §b%1$s§r would like to teleport to you. You can accept, by typing: "§e/treq accept %1$s§r".
You have ~30sec.
cmd.trienowtweaks.treq.to.requested: §a[TREQ]§r A teleport request has been sent to §b%1$s§r.
cmd.trienowtweaks.treq.accept.accept_fro: §a[TREQ] §b%1$s§r accepted your teleport request! Please wait §e~5sec§r.
cmd.trienowtweaks.treq.accept.none: §e[TREQ]§r Nothing to accept. The last request probably timed out.
cmd.trienowtweaks.treq.teleport.fail.mis: §c[TREQ]§r Request canceled. §b%1$s§r cannot be found anymore.
cmd.trienowtweaks.treq.teleport.fail.dim: §c[TREQ]§r §b%1$s §cis in a different §edimension §cthan you. This requires special code, which §atrienow §chasn't dealt with yet.
cmd.trienowtweaks.treq.ignored: §e[TREQ] §b%1$s§r ignored your request by not responding on time.
cmd.trienowtweaks.treq.block: §a[TREQ]§r You have now §cblocked §b%1$s§r from sending you teleport requests.
cmd.trienowtweaks.treq.unblock: §a[TREQ]§r You have now §aunblocked §b%1$s§r from sending you teleport requests.
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.help.addMotion:
Sets the §e<player>§r in motion with vector §e<x> <y> <z>
§r. If a player is targeted, it applies an absorption-buff with an amount of §e<hearts>.
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.heal: Healed §a%s§r to §c%s§r/§c§c%s§r and set to §emax food§r level
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.help.heal: Sets the §e[players]§r health and saturation to max or to §e[value].
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.help.help: Displays more information about the given command.
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.help.random: Ports the player to a random location inside the world border. Will try and find a safe place.
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.help.spawn: Ports the executing or given §e[player]§r to spawn.
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.random.start: Looking for a random place for you...
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.random.success0: Does a biome of type %1$s at [%2$s, %3$s, %4$s] sound good?
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.random.success1: How about a biome of type %1$s at [%2$s, %3$s, %4$s]?
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.random.success2: I found a biome of type %1$s at [%2$s, %3$s, %4$s] for you!
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.random.success3: I suggest [%2$s, %3$s, %4$s] in a biome of type %1$s.
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.random.fail: §c§l[FAIL]§r I tried to find a place, but I§r %s§r. Please try again.
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.random.fail1: only found §9water§r, which you'll probably §cdrown§r in
cmd.trienowtweaks.tt.random.fail2: had to give up after &n500&r checks
feature.trienowtweaks.anti_flying.messag: §c§oFlying is not allowed in this Dimension.
